title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – No Melvin Gordon Leverage, WR's Cashing Checks; Long Term Luck Concerns, Dabo's Saban 2.0; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – No Melvin Gordon Leverage, WR's Cashing Checks; Long Term Luck Concerns, Dabo's Saban 2.0; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast

https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2

In this episode, Middlekauff explains why Melvin Gordon doesn't have any leverage in his standoff with the Chargers, why wide receivers are cashing in like never before, how Dabo Swinney is morphing into Nick Saban 2.0, answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
